experience.description: Lead test automation initiatives and quality assurance efforts for enterprise-level applications. Design and implement comprehensive test frameworks using Selenium, Playwright, and API testing tools.

achievements.text: Reduced regression testing time from 40 hours to 2 hours through comprehensive automation framework
Increased code coverage from 45% to 85% across critical application modules
Built CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored team of 3 junior QA engineers in automation best practices

responsibilities: Design and maintain automated test frameworks for web, API, and mobile applications
Collaborate with development teams to integrate testing into CI/CD pipelines
Perform code reviews and establish testing best practices
Create and maintain comprehensive test documentation
Participate in sprint planning and provide QA estimates

experience.description: Developed and maintained automated test suites for e-commerce platform serving 100K+ daily users. Implemented API testing framework and performance testing strategies.

achievements.text: Automated 500+ test cases reducing manual testing effort by 70%
Identified and documented 200+ critical bugs before production release
Improved API test coverage to 90% across all microservices

responsibilities: Created and executed automated test scripts for web applications
Performed API testing and validation using Postman and REST Assured
Conducted performance and load testing using JMeter
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environment
Maintained test environments and test data management

experience.description: Started career in quality assurance, focusing on manual testing and transitioning to automation. Contributed to testing web applications and mobile apps for financial services clients.

achievements.text: Executed 1000+ manual test cases with 98% accuracy rate
Transitioned 150 manual test cases to automated scripts
Reduced bug escape rate to production by 40%

responsibilities: Executed manual test cases for web and mobile applications
Created detailed bug reports and tracked issues to resolution
Participated in sprint planning and daily stand-ups
Learned automation frameworks and began automating test cases
Assisted in test environment setup and maintenance

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
